title: Private equity recruiting returned with its usual chaos — and better candidates
full_text:
Private equity recruiting returned with its usual chaos — and better candidates. After months on hold, PE firms moved fast — and recruiters say the delay produced more prepared candidates when on-cycle finally returned.. Wall Street professional running Wall Street signGetty Images; Alyssa Powell/BI
  • PE recruiting restarted after a months-long pause sparked by pressure from Wall Street banks.
  • The paus… [+6075 chars]
